text: (Imanadharakanno!) Tumhi asa lokanna apala mitra banavu naka, je tumacya dina-dharmala khela-tamasa banavuna thatta udavitata, maga te tyancyapaiki asota jyanna tumacyapurvi grantha dila gela kinva kaphira (inkari) asota jara tumhi (kharokhara) imanadharaka asala tara allahace bhaya balaguna raha
